title: Fears for Ben Affleck as he's spotted leaving charity bash stumbling and unsteady on his feet
text:

Ben Affleck has been spotted leaving a charity bash unsteady on his feet - just hours after celebrating his year-long recovery.

The Batman actor, 47, made his passionate tweet about his recovery just hours before stumbling out of La Peer Hotel in West Hollywood in a skull mask.

Holding onto a mystery blonde female companion the father of three was left unsteady as she left the Hollywood star to get their car.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: NIKO / BACKGRID)

In a navy suit and black shirt, Ben, who was at the Unicef Masquerade ball, can be seen falling backwards before grabbing hold of a stationary car's brake lights.

Gone Girl star Ben completed a 30-day program at rehab for alcohol abuse after ex-wife Jennifer Garner staged an intervention in August 2018. He also had stints at other facilities back in 2001 and 2017.

(Image: Splash News)

On Saturday he tweeted referencing his recovery to raise money for homeless charity Midnight Mission.

"HA, you got me. I'm dating," began the actor's tweet.

"But let’s be serious for a moment and talk about something that is actually important. I have been in recovery for over a year and part of that is helping out others.

(Image: Getty)

"The Midnight Mission is an incredible organization that helps those in need with housing, training, development and recovery.

"I’m making a donation today because there are people battling addiction every day that don’t have the resources and need help,' he concluded.

"Raya, you in? Who else is with me?"

Ben, who split with ex-wife Jennifer in 2015, was said to be interested in a woman out of his Hollywood circle.

A source had told Page Six: "He seems to want a real partner and is not looking to date a celebrity. He is private and is in a good space right now."
description: Just 24 hours earlier the Gone Girl star had been tweeting about his 365 day recovery
